name: freescout
description: Freescout is a self-hosted helpdesk and shared inbox system designed as an alternative to HelpScout. It supports email integration, collision detection, canned replies, and team workflows through a powerful web UI.
features: Helpdesk: Self-hosted support system, Shared inbox, Email integration. HelpScout alternative with full control.
Team Workflows: Collision detection, Canned replies, Assignment rules. Efficient support operations.
Powerful UI: Clean interface. Professional experience.
Collaboration: Multiple agents and departments. Organized support.
Email Integration: Connect mailboxes. Unified inbox.
Ticket Management: Track customer issues. Organized support.
Knowledge Base: Self-service documentation. Reduce tickets.
Reports: Track team performance. Data-driven insights.
Mobile-Friendly: Support on the go. Responsive design.
